title: Dual Monitor Setup Issues
description: Fix problems with setting up or using multiple monitors.

steps.title: Detect Displays
steps.instruction: Windows: Right-click desktop → Display settings → Scroll down → Click 'Detect' to find connected monitors.

steps.title: Check Physical Connections
steps.instruction: Ensure both monitors are powered on and cables (HDMI/DisplayPort/VGA) are firmly connected to both computer and monitors.

steps.title: Configure Display Mode
steps.instruction: Press Win+P to open Project menu → Choose 'Extend' to use both monitors independently, or 'Duplicate' to mirror displays.

steps.title: Arrange Monitor Position
steps.instruction: Display settings → Identify monitors → Drag monitor icons to match physical arrangement (left/right) → Apply.

steps.title: Update Graphics Driver
steps.instruction: Device Manager → Display adapters → Right-click graphics card → Update driver. Download latest drivers from manufacturer's website.
